name: the host (itch)
description:
The host is a game where you end up on a island because your boat run out of gas. and In the process of searching for gas, you find yourself regretting that you never checked the tank.

Press escape to get to settings.

Game controls

MOVE - WASD

USE/ACTION - R OR L MOUSE

CAMER TOGGLE - MID MOUSE WhEEL

CROUCH - CTRL

RUN - SHIFT 

MENU - Esc

INVERTORY - TAB 

CORNER PEAK - Q E
